Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class 1 lasso peptide
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.N-terminal Modification: Cyclization of a N-terminal between Cys1 and Asp9
Sequence Information.Function: Active against HIV-1 virus in vitro.

Literature.Title: Isolation of RP 71955, a new anti-HIV-1 peptide secondary metabolite.
Literature.Author: Helynck G, Dubertret C, Mayaux JF, Leboul J.
